metadata.title: CVE-2016-6519 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the "Shares" overview inOpenstack Manila before 2.5.1 allows remote authenticated users to injectarbitrary web script or HTML via the Metadata field in the "Create Share"form.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6519` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-manila-ui - 2.5.1-0
No subscription required

criterions.comment: manila-ui package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.1-0').
